title: 302(b) of the Policing, Security and Community Safety Act 2024 (No. 1 of 2024)
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Policing, Security and Community Safety
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Policing, Security and Community Safety 

Act 2024 (Commencement) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited policing security community safety act 2024 (commencement) order 2024

title: 302(b) of the Policing, Security and Community Safety Act 2024 (No. 1 of 2024)
heading: 2. The 14th day of May 2024 is appointed as the day on which section
text_raw:
2. The 14th day of May 2024 is appointed as the day on which section 
302(b) of the Policing, Security and Community Safety Act 2024 (No. 1 of 2024) 
shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

14 May, 2024. 

HELEN MCENTEE, 
Minister for Justice. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 17th May, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [214] 3
